project.projectDes: We have said that the problem is to specify the recognition process economically. This involves knowing about the email signal we wish to recognise in order to specify the processing required by the machine. The most striking aspect of email, which achieves its full impact when ASR is considered.

we can divide test data data and training data in many ways, mostly we will divide in 20:80 ratio

project.projectDes: It is another advanced-level ML project where you have to deal mostly with audio data. Speech emotion recognition attempts to identify and interpret user emotions and deduce the emotional state from speech. To train such an algorithm, you have to use most of the training data as audio data. This system will take user speech as input

project.projectDes: Have you ever seen movies or web series on online streaming platforms? Once you watch one or two of them, you will notice that apps like Netflix and Amazon Prime recommend new web series and movies. It is because these apps render machine learning models that try to understand the customer's taste. All modern apps come with a recommendation engine that suggests users for more engagement.
